data.title: So-So Wings
data.text: I enjoy wings, but WingStreets are only average.  They are not presented with any flair and seriously, kind of boring. Even the wait staff is boring and average.  But, if you like a quite, low activity place, this could be the place for you. But, watch out for the homeless people, they'll try to nickle and dime you to death in the parking lot.

data.title: Great customer service!
data.text: Was so hungry and headed out of Amarillo late last night. Did not want a burger, but thought pizza would just take too long. Decided to take a chance on this location anyway. The young man at the counter told me it would be about 10-15 minutes, and kept his word. My pizza came out piping hot and was delicious! The interior was very clean and a large area. More than anything, I wish I had gotten the name of the young man who treated me with such caring....he is truly an asset to this establishment.
